name: URL Shortener app
description: Link shortener service to save and obtain a shorter address from any URL.

name: Booking app
description: Accommodation reservations with user registration and login, additionally administrator to add, edit and delete any accommodation.

name: Peephole app
description: An application to connect people in madrid, where you can register and talk to different people according to your interests, you can also choose and book activities that will be published to expand your network of contacts and friendships.

name: To do app
description: A to-do list application which connects to a database and can create, delete and complete the task it has set out to do.

description: Calculator with basic functions created with React

name: JavaScript Calculator
description: Calculator with basic functions created with html, css and javascript
